model

Interface IStockMarketModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockMarketModelImpl

    public interface IStockMarketModel
    The interface IStockMarketModel which has methods to buy stocks, calculate cost basis, view composition, create and evaluate portfolio.

    • Method Summary
